
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VAviInfoFramePacket.cpp
          VAviInfoFramePacket.h
          VAviInfoFramePacket__Syms.cpp
          VAviInfoFramePacket__Syms.h
  DEPENDS AviInfoFramePacket.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/AviInfoFramePacket.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VAviInfoFramePacket STATIC VAviInfoFramePacket.cpp VAviInfoFramePacket__Syms.cpp
    AviInfoFramePacket.v
)

target_compile_options(VAviInfoFramePacket PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VAviInfoFramePacket PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VAviInfoFramePacket verilated)
